original_title: Harpocrates (or, how to run away quietly)
overview: "So wherever you are, wherever you've gone, just stop."  â€‹ The noise is a lot, maybe too much. When a man runs away from all he knows for some peace, he's haunted by what he's escaping, and the music of his nightmares blends into his reality...
tagline: "So wherever you are, wherever you've gone, just stop."
title: Harpocrates (or, how to run away quietly)
